summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Career Plus gig marketplace. Found critical frontend issues preventing core functionality, backend auth working but requires email confirmation, AI integration failing.

authentication_issues.issue: Login fails with 'Invalid credentials' after successful signup
authentication_issues.symptoms: Supabase requires email confirmation before login
authentication_issues.workaround: Expected behavior - users need to confirm email

critical_bugs.issue: React Select component error prevents page from loading
critical_bugs.error: A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot browse gigs - core functionality broken

ui_bugs.issue: Button not clickable due to overlay interception
ui_bugs.workaround: AI chat UI visible on homepage but button has click issues

working_features: Homepage loads with professional dark theme

critical_fixes_required: Fix React Select component error in Gigs page - add proper value props to SelectItem components
Fix OpenAI API integration - check API key and model name (currently using 'gpt-5-mini' which may not exist)
Fix AI chat button click interception issue
medium_priority: Consider implementing email confirmation flow or use test users for development
Test gig creation, browsing, and application flows after Select component fix

success_percentage.backend: 60% (basic endpoints work, auth works but needs confirmation, AI fails)
success_percentage.frontend: 40% (homepage works, auth UI works, but core gigs functionality broken)
